column1: However, the National Police Commission  (‘NPC’) informed (‘X6’)  the Inspector General
of  Police  that  the  Petitioner’s  application  was  rejected  whilst  the  NPC  has  decided  to
antedate  the  appointment  of  W.  R.  A.  D.  A.  K.  Ranasinghe,  ASP  w.e.f.  01.01.2008.
Meantime,  the  Petitioner  was  promoted  to  the  post  of  ASP  w.e.f.  13.01.2014  by  the  1st
